name: Mortal Kombat Quiz Challenge - How Much Do You Know? |   Movies

questions.text: Who is the first person to compete in the tournament?
questions.explanation:
Liu Kang.

	Liu fought the guy that roared like a lion.

questions.text: Who is the first person that Johny Cage fights?
questions.explanation:
Scorpion.

	Cage may have won but Scorpion got more kicks on him than anybody else in the movie!

questions.text: Liu defeats Sub-Zero by which method?
questions.explanation:
water.

	He used the element that brings life by using water against his ice sheild!

questions.text: Who was the person who defeats Goro?
questions.explanation:
Johnny Cage.

	Johnny Cage throws Goro off a cliff!

questions.text: During Johny Cage's fight against Goro, how much were the glasses that Goro crushed at the beginning of the fight?
